channel.title: HP Bar error
channel.description: Anyone know how to make the HP bar not be so random? (Working off of propland v1)

item.title: HP Bar error
item.dc:creator: @popbob popbob
item.description:
@popbob wrote:

[code]
private static void appendHit2Update(Player p, StaticPacketBuilder updateBlock) {
if(p.getHits().getHitDamage2() < 128) {
updateBlock.addByte((byte) p.getHits().getHitDamage2());
} else {
updateBlock.addShort(p.getHits().getHitDamage2() + 32768);
}
updateBlock.addByte((byte) p.getHits().getHitType2());
}

private static void appendHitUpdate(Player p, StaticPacketBuilder updateBlock) {
	if(p.getHits().getHitDamage1() < 128) {
		updateBlock.addByte((byte) p.getHits().getHitDamage1());
	} else {
		updateBlock.addShort(p.getHits().getHitDamage1() + 32768);
	}
	updateBlock.addByteC(p.getHits().getHitType1());
	int hpRatio = p.getSkills().getLevel(3) * 255 / p.getSkills().getLevelForXp(3);
	updateBlock.addByte((byte) hpRatio); 
}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: HP Bar error
item.dc:creator: @Wildfire Wildfire
item.description:
@Wildfire wrote:

Still doesnâ€™t work, this is everything I see in rs2hd/packetbuilder/PlayerUpdate.java:

[code] private static void appendHit2Update(Player p, StaticPacketBuilder updateBlock) {
updateBlock.addByte((byte) p.getHits().getHitDamage2());
updateBlock.addByte((byte) p.getHits().getHitType2());
}

private static void appendHitUpdate(Player p, StaticPacketBuilder updateBlock) {
	updateBlock.addByte((byte) p.getHits().getHitDamage1());
	updateBlock.addByteC(p.getHits().getHitType1());
	int hpRatio = p.getSkills().getLevel(3) * 255 / p.getSkills().getLevelForXp(3);
	updateBlock.addByte((byte) hpRatio); 
}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: HP Bar error
item.dc:creator: @Graham Graham
item.description:
@Graham wrote:

int hpRatio = p.getSkills().getLevel(3) * 255 / p.getSkills().getLevelForXp(3);

That is the fixed version from the 508 rs2hd, try adding that and replacing the last addByte with addByte(hpRatio).

EDIT:

	private static void appendHitUpdate(Player p, StaticPacketBuilder updateBlock) {
		updateBlock.addByte((byte) p.getHits().getHitDamage1());
		updateBlock.addByteC(p.getHits().getHitType1());
		int hpRatio = p.getSkills().getLevel(3) * 255 / p.getSkills().getLevelForXp(3);
		updateBlock.addByte((byte) hpRatio); 
	}

Read full topic

item.title: HP Bar error
item.dc:creator: @Wildfire Wildfire
item.description:
@Wildfire wrote:

I assume bug. Where would I find that (First time messing with 525s really)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 22, 2009, 11:03:39 am[/size][hr]Actually, I think I found it.

private static void appendHitUpdate(Player p, StaticPacketBuilder updateBlock) { updateBlock.addByte((byte) p.getHits().getHitDamage1()); updateBlock.addByteC(p.getHits().getHitType1()); int currentHP = p.getSkills().getLevel(3); int maxHP = p.getSkills().getLevelForXp(3); int hpDiff = maxHP - currentHP; double piece = 255.0/maxHP; double redLength = piece * hpDiff; byte greenLength = (byte)(255 - redLength); updateBlock.addByte(greenLength); }[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 22, 2009, 11:32:22 am[/size][hr]Gangster?

Read full topic
